title:
Can I have a firearm in my possession on my own property if I have consumed alcohol? 

example: I go to dinner and have a glass of wine or a mixed drink, come home and suspect an intruder on my property. I go around to check property while armed. Is this legal or illegal under N.C. law?

Thank you.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/can-i-have-a-firearm-in-my-possession-on-my-own-property-if-i-have-consumed-alcohol/
